User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the system.

role.description: Role of the user (e.g., super_admin, admin, user).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user was last updated.

sports.description: List of sports supported by the facility.

city.description: City where the facility is located.

region.description: Region where the facility is located.

indoor.description: Indicates if the facility is indoor.

adminId.description: Reference to the Admin user who manages this facility. (Relationship: User 1:N Facility)

Reservation.title: Reservation
Reservation.description: Represents a reservation for a facility.

facilityId.description: Reference to the Facility being reserved. (Relationship: Facility 1:N Reservation)

userId.description: Reference to the User who made the reservation. (Relationship: User 1:N Reservation)

status.description: Status of the reservation (e.g., pending, confirmed, cancelled).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the reservation was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the reservation was last updated.

adminId.description: Reference to the Admin user who initiated the import. (Relationship: User 1:N Import)

status.description: Status of the import (e.g., pending, processing, completed, failed).

report.description: Report of the import operation, including success and error counts.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the import was started.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the import was last updated.

id.description: Unique identifier for the audit log entry.

userId.description: Reference to the User who performed the action. (Relationship: User 1:N AuditLog)

entityType.description: Type of entity affected (e.g., User, Facility, Reservation).
